characters.name: David Chen (Client)
true_knowledge: Discovered systematic discrepancies in official court transcripts vs. his originals
Found evidence that someone was altering transcripts after he submitted them
Traced alterations to administrative access codes beyond his clearance level
Was preparing to report evidence tampering to Judge Morrison
Went to chambers to deliver backup transcripts and corruption evidence

what_he_hides: His investigation into transcript tampering that could implicate colleagues
His backup copies of original transcripts stored on personal drive
His planned meeting with Judge Morrison to report corruption
His knowledge of which specific cases had tampered evidence

Killed Judge Morrison when she discovered the tampering operation

Her financial motivation and payments from external parties
Her murder of Judge Morrison during chamber maintenance visit
Her systematic abuse of administrative privileges
Her manipulation of court security and evidence systems

characters.name: Detective Ray Kowalski
true_knowledge: Found David in chambers with victim and suspicious evidence package
Security footage appears to show David entering chambers before murder
David's transcription equipment contains recently deleted files
